multiROC | R package
  • Functions
  • Tutorials and examples
    • Introduction to `multiROC`

Reference version 0.0.1

ROC analysis

The main functions for ROC analysis are roc_analysis and roc_multi_analysis.

roc_analysis print

[!] Carry the ROC analysis

roc_multi_analysis print

[!] Carry out ROC analysis for each feature in pairs of groups

Objects management functions

roc_get roc_get_all_results roc_cutoff roc_tp roc_fn roc_fp roc_tn roc_sens roc_spec

[!] Access elements of roc_result_list object

Performance measures

calculate_acc roc_calculate_acc calculate_bac roc_calculate_bac calculate_auc roc_calculate_auc calculate_npv roc_calculate_npv calculate_ppv roc_calculate_ppv calculate_sensitivity roc_calculate_se calculate_specificity roc_calculate_sp calculate_youdens_j roc_youdens_j calculate_kappa roc_calculate_kappa calculate_wkappa roc_calculate_wkappa

[!!!] Calculate various performance measures for classificatory analysis

measure_kappa

Cohen's kappa

measure_wkappa

Weighted Cohen's kappa

Helper and utility functions

class_add class_remove

Manage S3 class labels

Datasets

fluorescence

Datasets of simulated spectroscopic data

Other functions

MultiROC algorithm for spectroscopic data analysis
